## Checklist
- [ ] Dashboard has a descriptive name
- [ ] Description explains what the dashboard monitors
- [ ] Dashboard has been tested by importing into a fresh Console
- [ ] Card count is between 4-12
- [ ] Tags are relevant and use existing tags where possible
